API Documentation for MGFIT-idl

IDL Library for Least-Squares Minimization Genetic Algorithm Fitting

Overview Directory File Etc Categories Search Index Warnings Help Developer documentation

Directory: ./

Contents

.pro files

mgfit_combine_high_low_exp.pro

This function combines two sets of detected lines.

mgfit_contin.pro

This function extracts the continuum from the spectrum.

mgfit_detect_deep_lines.pro

This function detects lines from the deep line list.

mgfit_detect_lines.pro

This function detects lines using the string and deep line lists.

mgfit_detect_strong_lines.pro

This function detects lines from the strong line list.

mgfit_emis.pro

This function fits multiple Gaussian functions to a list of emission lines using a least-squares minimization technique and a genetic-type random walk method.

mgfit_emis_err.pro

This function estimates the uncertainties introduced by the best-fit model residuals and the white noise quantified using the signal-dependent noise model of least-squares Gaussian fitting (Lenz & Ayres 1992; 1992PASP..104.1104L) based on on the work of Landman, Roussel-Dupre, and Tanigawa (1982; 1982ApJ...261..732L).

mgfit_filter_lines.pro

This function combines two sets of detected lines.

mgfit_fltr_emis.pro

This function filters the emission line lists from the list of emission lines within the specified wavelength range.

mgfit_init_emis.pro

This function initializes the emission line list with the specified wavelength array and flux array.

mgfit_init_fltr_emis.pro

This function initializes and filters the emission line lists from the list of emission lines within the specified wavelength range

mgfit_init_seed.pro

This function initializes the random seed based on the system clock

mgfit_init_spec.pro

This function creates the spectrum from the wavelength array and flux array.

mgfit_mutation1.pro

This function is for the genetic algorithm mutation type-1

mgfit_read_lines.pro

This function save detected lines.

mgfit_synth_spec.pro

This function makes a spectrum from given lines.

mgfit_write_lines.pro

This function save detected lines.

minloc_idl.pro

This function determines the location of the element in the array with the minimum value

mpfit_whitenoise.pro

This function extracts the white noise from the spectrum.

nint_idl.pro

NAME: NINT PURPOSE: Nearest integer function.

read_deeplines.pro

This function reads the list of deep lines from the 3rd binary table extension of the FITS data file (../data/linedata.fits).

read_skylines.pro

This function reads the list of sky lines from the 3rd binary table extension of the FITS data file (../data/linedata.fits).

read_stronglines.pro

This function reads the list of strong lines from the 1rd binary table extension of the FITS data file (../data/linedata.fits).

read_ultradeeplines.pro

This function reads the list of ultra deep lines from the 4rd binary table extension of the FITS data file (../data/linedata.fits).

Documentation for the MGFIT-idl Library. See the GitHub repository for more information about MGFIT-idl.
